text: Would I Lie to You? is a British comedy panel game shown on BBC One. It began on 16 June 2007. The first two series were presented by Angus Deayton. Since then it has been presented by Rob Brydon. There are two teams of three people, a team captain and two celebrity guests. The captains are David Mitchell and Lee Mack. During each episode, the contestants take turns to make statements about themselves. The other team try to work out whether the statement is true or false, by questioning the person who has made the statement. == Other websites == * Category:2007 British television series debuts Category:2000s British television series Category:2010s British television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:British comedy television series Category:British television game shows Category:Panel games Category:English- language television programs
title: Would I Lie to You? (TV series)
